name: ReDying
description:
A top down zombie wave shooter, this was made in 2 weeks and was apart of a competition between me and Verosity.  Verosity used GDevelop, and I used unity. The theme was undead. Check out both games and put in the comments which you think are better!

Verosity Itch.io game page: Verosity's Game

Spotify Music Used: "8-bit" by arthurrpizza (no affiliation with game development)

Sound Effects from Unity Asset Store: B.G.M
